attributes.action: Reduce wait time and increase access and services for mental health patients.
attributes.additional_details:
For articles related to this for more information at how little is actually available please see:

attributes.background:
This is regarding mental health and the frankly dangerous lack of
provisions in place for staff and users. For full details please follow this link
https://www.change.org/p/rt-hon-matt-hancock-mp-matt-hancock-mp-reduce-wait-time-and-increase-access-and-services-for-mental-health-patients
